articles.description: "We are partners in space, and I don't want that to cease," Bill Nelson said
articles.content: WASHINGTON, June 11. /TASS/. The Russian-US cooperation in space is unique and extraordinary and must not cease, NASA Administrator Bill Nelson said in an interview to Politico after talks with Rosco… [+1564 chars]
